sections.heading: Recording brand and earmark; lease of brand for transient livestock3-1262
sections.text: Recording brand and earmark; lease of brand for transient livestockA. The division shall record all brands and earmarks adopted as provided in this article. Recording shall consist of depicting a facsimile of the brand adopted
